item.title: Migrating from Google Workspace and Outlook Mail to iCloud+
item.description: Why I’m Migrating from Google Workspace and Outlook to iCloud+ Google Workspace My Google Workspace subscription is becoming increasingly more expensive ðŸ’°. The current price is Â£8.28 for the Business Standard plan, and next month this will be increasing to Â£9.20. This has become too expensive for me, and I’ve been looking for a cheaper alternative. Outlook Mail I have an Outlook account which has been lying dormant for a long time now.
